alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 5:11PM CST until December 29 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN CHICKASAW...SOUTHEASTERN PONTOTOC...SOUTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA...LEE AND NORTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 510 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Troy, or 8 miles south of Trace State Park, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Verona, Okolona, Trace State Park, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Shannon, Plantersville, Troy, Furrs, Evergreen, Nettleton, Chiwapa, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Leotis, Flowerdale, Old Union and Beech Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
